attributes.additional_details:
GEORGIA HAS AN INCURABLE PROGRESSIVE CONDITION  CALLED CHARCOT MARIE TOOTH

WE BELIEVE GEORGIA IS ENTITLED TO NHS TREATMENT LIKE EVERY CHILD IN THE UK!

 EFFECTIVE TREATMENT LIKE THE TREATMENTS SHE HAS RESPONDED TO SO WELL IN THE PAST SIX YEARS!

GEORGIA DESERVES NHS TREATMENT AND EQUIPMENT LIKE OTHERS WITH CHARCOT MARIE TOOTH !

GEORGIA DESERVES ACCESS TO COMPLEX TREATMENTS TO TREAT HER CONDITION AS IT PROGRESSES !

GEORGIA DESERVES HELP AND UNDERSTANDING IN EDUCATION!

GEORGIA DOES NOT DESERVE TO BE EXCLUDED FROM SCHOOL BECAUSE OF HER MEDICAL CONDITION!

FOR THIS REASON WE HAVE STARTED A CHAMPAIGN PART OF OUR CHAMPAIGN IS TO COLLECT SIGNITURES IN PETITION TO FIGHT TO GET GEORGIA THE TREATMENTS SHE NEEDS AND DESERVES ON THE NHS.

PLEASE SUPPORT GEORGIA AND SIGN OUR PETITION
THANK-YOU
